Ramming Speed

  1. CUSTOM CARD NOTE
    Megatron - Autobot Bane     [Source: ARK]
    The ability of the P38 Fusion Blaster to redeploy Megatron to the battlefield is a replacement effect that prevents him from going to the KO area if he was upgrading a Decepticon Leader that has 10 stars or more. This includes a card scrapping him, such as an opposing Ramming Speed, or if the game itself tries to scrap him due to the character he is upgrading was KOâ€™d.
